sentence.Network_en: He does deserve some good luck after so much wretchedness.
sentence.Network_cn: 经过这么多苦难之后，他应该行点好运了。

sentence.Network_en: But, oh, the wretchedness of being forced this way!
sentence.Network_cn: 可是这样被骗认输太让人难堪了!

sentence.Network_en: But hunger and wretchedness rise superior to fears in the long run.
sentence.Network_cn: 可是从长远的角度来说害怕是次要的,主要的问题是饥饿和疲乏.

" the first wish of my heart , " said she to herself , " is never in company with either of them. their society can afford no pleasure that will atone for such wretchedness as this !她心里想：“我只希望今后永远不要跟他们来往。跟他们做朋友虽然能够获得愉快，可是实在抵偿不了这种难堪的局面。

entry.def: You describe someone as wretched when you feel sorry for them because they are in an unpleasant situation or have suffered unpleasant experiences.

example.ex: You have built up a huge property empire by buying from wretched people who had to sell or starve.
example.tran: 你靠从那些不卖房就得挨饿的可怜人手里买下房子后建立起了庞大的房产帝国。

entry.def: You use wretched to describe someone or something that you dislike or feel angry with.

example.ex: Wretched woman, he thought, why the hell can't she wait?...
example.tran: 他想，可恶的女人，她怎么就不能等一等呢？

example.ex: Theft is something that really disgusts me. It makes me feel hateful towards this whole wretched island.
example.tran: 偷窃是让我深恶痛绝的事情，它让我对这整个该死的岛都充满仇视。

entry.def: Someone who feels wretched feels very unhappy.

example.ex: I feel really confused and wretched...
example.tran: 我觉得十分迷惘，难过极了。

example.ex: The wretched look on the little girl's face made him sorry.
example.tran: 小女孩脸上痛苦的表情让他很难受。

entry.def: If you describe something as wretched, you are emphasizing that it is very bad or of very poor quality.

example.ex: The pay has always been wretched.

means.word_mean: 1. a state of ill-being due to affliction or misfortune;

sentences.sentence: "the misery and wretchedness of those slums is intolerable"

auth_sentence.content: The dancers...brought...whispers of waspish dressing-room tiffs and wretchedness.
auth_sentence.res_content: The dancers...brought...whispers of waspish dressing-room tiffs and wretchedness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The dancers...brought...whispers of waspish dressing-room tiffs and wretchedness.

auth_sentence.content: Wretchedness...shivers hunger-stricken into its lair of straw.
auth_sentence.res_content: Wretchedness...shivers hunger-stricken into its lair of straw.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wretchedness...shivers hunger-stricken into its lair of straw.
